flavorText:
"Relent, and you may transcend your situation."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen
name: Energy Arc
originalText: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.

rulings.text: Energy Arc can target untapped creatures. The second part of the effect will still affect them.
The number of target creatures may be zero.

text: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
